name: High Warlord Naj'entus
rules: Immune (Can't be attacked, damaged, or targeted.);At the end of your turn, put a spine counter on target opposing hero, and Naj'entus deals 2 melee damage to it.;2, Exhaust a hero or ally in your party with no spine counters -> Destroy all spine counters and flip Naj'entus. Only opponents can use this power.;BACK: When Naj'entus flips to this side, he deals 2 frost damage to each opposing hero.;Naj'entus has +2 ATK while attacking.

name: Supremus
rules: Supremus has +2 ATK while attacking.;When Supremus deals combat damage to a hero or ally, he may also deal that much melee damage to another target hero or ally.;At the end of your turn, flip Supremus.;BACK: At the start of your turn, choose a random opponent, and Supremus deals 2 fire damage to each hero and ally in his party.;At the end of your turn, flip Supremus.

name: Shade of Akama
rules: Immune (Can't be attacked, damaged, or targeted.);At the start of your turn, Shade of Akama deals 1 melee damage to target opposing hero or ally for each Ashtongue Channeler in your party.;When the last Ashtongue Channeler leaves your party, flip Shade of Akama.;BACK: Shade of Akama has +3 ATK while attacking.;At the start of your turn, choose an opposing hero. Shade of Akama has an additional +3 ATK while attacking that hero this turn. When that hero is destroyed this turn, destroy all opposing heroes.

name: Teron Gorefiend
rules: Teron has +4 ATK while attacking.;At the end of your turn, put four Shadowy Constructs into play, and a non-ghost opponent becomes a ghost until Teron fl ips or is destroyed.;When the last Shadowy Construct leaves your party, flip Teron.;At the start of your turn, you win the game if all opponents are ghosts. (See ghost rules.);BACK: Teron has +2 ATK while attacking.;At the end of your turn, choose a random opponent, and Teron deals 1 shadow damage to each hero and ally in that opponent's party for each of your resources.

name: Gurtogg Bloodboil
rules: Gurtogg has +5 ATK while attacking.;At the end of your turn, destroy up to five non-[Melee] allies and flip Gurtogg.;BACK: Untargetable;At the start of your turn, choose a random opposing hero, and it heals 5 damage from itself. Gurtogg can attack only that hero and has +15 ATK while attacking this turn.;At the end of your turn, flip Gurtogg.

name: Shrine of Lost Souls / Essence of Suffering
rules: Immune (Can’t be attacked, damaged, or targeted.);When the last Soul Fragment leaves your party, flip Shrine of Lost Souls.;BACK: Essence of Suffering has +15 ATK while attacking.;Opposing heroes and allies are protectors.;If Essence of Suffering would be destroyed, swap it with Essence of Desire instead.;(This is not a new hero.)

name: Essence of Desire / Essence of Anger
rules: Essence of Desire has +5 ATK while attacking.;When Essence of Desire is dealt damage, it deals that much melee damage to its source.;If Essence of Desire would be destroyed, remove all damage from it and flip it instead.;BACK: At the start of your turn, put fi ve anger counters on Essence of Anger.;Essence of Anger has +X ATK while attacking, where X is 5 plus the number of anger counters.;Remove an anger counter -> Essence of Anger deals 1 melee damage to target ally.

name: Mother Shahraz
rules: Shahraz has +4 ATK while attacking.;When Shahraz deals combat damage to a hero or ally, she also deals that much melee damage to each of up to two other target heroes and/or allies.;When Shahraz is dealt damage, flip her if she has 15 or more damage.;BACK: Shahraz has +7 ATK while attacking.;1 -> Shahraz deals 1 shadow damage to each opposing hero and ally.

name: Illidari Council
rules: Immune (Can’t be attacked, damaged, or targeted.);Council Members can’t leave your party.;When the last Council Member is dealt fatal damage, flip The Illidari Council and remove all four from the game.;4 -> Destroy all opposing abilities.;BACK: When The Illidari Council flips to this side, swap it with The Betrayer and say, “You are not prepared!”

name: Betrayer
rules: The Betrayer has +10 ATK while attacking.;[Exhaust] -> The Betrayer heals 15 damage from himself.;At the end of your turn, flip The Betrayer.;BACK: The Betrayer has +10 ATK while attacking.;[Exhaust] -> The Betrayer deals 3 shadow damage to each opposing hero and ally.;At the end of your turn, flip The Betrayer.

name: Fel Geyser
rules: Traitor Hero Required;Ongoing: Opposing quests have As an additional cost to complete, turn another one of your quests face down.
flavour: Gurtogg Bloodboil's taste for destruction has a way of erupting onto his foes.

name: Needle Spine
rules: Traitor Hero Required;When target hero or ally deals combat damage to your defending hero this turn, your hero also deals that much ranged damage to it.
flavour: My patience has run out! Die! Die!

name: Tidal Burst
rules: Traitor Hero Required;Your hero deals 3 frost damage to target opposing ally and each other opposing ally with the same cost as that ally.
flavour: Feel the wrath of the deep!

name: Aura of Anger
rules: Traitor Hero Required;Ongoing: Heroes and allies in your party have +1 ATK while attacking damaged heroes and allies.
flavour: My soul longs for vengeance - Illidan Stormrage

name: Crushing Shadows
rules: Traitor Hero Required;Each opponent discards a random card, and your hero deals shadow damage to his hero equal to that card's cost.
flavour: Its darkness can strangle heroes and suffocate hope.

name: Hateful Strike
rules: Traitor Hero Required;If target player has exactly one ally in his party, destroy it.
flavour: A strike borne of malice and executed with hatred.

name: Fel-Acid Breath
rules: Traitor Hero Required;Target opponent chooses three allies in his party, in order. Your hero deals 3, 2, and 1 nature damage to them, respectively.

name: Doom Blossom
rules: Traitor Hero Required;Attach to target hero or ally, and put three blossom counters on Doom Blossom.;Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero deals 1 shadow damage to attached character for each blossom counter, and then you remove one. If none remain, destroy Doom Blossom.

name: Arcing Smash
rules: Traitor Hero Required;Destroy target opposing equipment and all opposing equipment with the same cost as that equipment.
flavour: When helms are cracked, skulls aren't far behind. - Codex of Defense

name: Aura of Desire
rules: Ongoing: [Exhaust], Discard a card -> Your hero deals 2 shadow damage to target ally.;[Exhaust], Discard two cards -> Destroy target ability or equipment.;[Exhaust], Discard five cards -> Destroy all opposing abilities, allies and equipment.

name: Aura of Suffering
rules: Ongoing: Opposing heroes and allies can't be healed.
flavour: Pain and suffering are all that await you. - Essence of Suffering

name: Eye Blast
rules: Ongoing: Destroy Eye Balst -> Destroy target ability, ally, or equipment.
flavour: Witness your destruction!

name: Fel Rage
rules: Choose one: Draw three cards; or discard your hand and draw five cards.
flavour: I'll rip the meat from your bones! - Gurtogg Bloodboil

name: Fixate
rules: Your hero has +3 ATK, and combat damage that would deal is unpreventable this turn.
flavour: Misery loves company.

name: Parasitic Shadowfiend
rules: Interrupt target ability, ally, or equipment card.
flavour: Is this it, mortals? Is this all the fury you can muster? - Illidan Stormrage

name: Prismatic Shield
rules: This turn, if a hero or ally in your party would be dealt damage, prevent 3 of it.
flavour: I'm not impressed.

name: Sinful Beam
rules: Your hero deals X shadow damage to target opposing hero or ally and each opposing hero and ally with the same class as that character.
flavour: You play, you pay.

name: Wicked Beam
rules: Your hero deals X shadow damage to target opposing hero or ally and each opposing hero and ally with the same race as that character.
flavour: Naughty, naughty...

name: Ashtongue Battlelord
rules: Traitor Hero: When Ashtongue Battlelord enters play, destroy target undamaged opposing ally.;Loyal Hero: When Ashtongue Battlelord enters play, destroy all damaged opposing allies.

name: Ashtongue Rogue
rules: Traitor Hero: Elusive, Ferocity;Loyal Hero: Long-Range, Stealth
flavour: We'll see where my tribe's loyalties lie once we make our move. - Akama

name: Bonechewer Behemoth
rules: Traitor Hero Required;When Bonechewer Behemoth enters play, he deals 4 fire damage to target hero.
flavour: Brimstone and fire follow in his wake.

name: Bonechewer Shield Disciple
rules: Traitor Hero Required;Protector
flavour: Glory to the Fel Horde!

name: Charming Courtesan
rules: Traitor Hero Required;If Charming Courtesan would be dealt 2 or less damage, prevent it.
flavour: That which you desire lies this way, hero.

name: Coilskar General
rules: Traitor Hero Required;When Coilskar General enters play, put three Naga ally tokens into play 1 [Melee] / 1 [Health].

name: Coilskar Wrangler
rules: Traitor Hero Required;2, Destroy an ally in your party -> Each opponent destroys an ally in his party.
flavour: His pets are ill-treated and ill-tempered.

name: Illidari Archon
rules: Traitor Hero Required;When Illidari Archon attacks, you may ready one of your resources.
flavour: Their souls are committed to the darkest of purposes.

name: Illidari Blood Lord
rules: Traitor Hero Required;When Illidari Blood Lord enters play, each player turns one of his face-up resources face down.
flavour: This world belongs to the Illidari.

name: Priestess of Dementia
rules: Traitor Hero Required;2, Destroy an ally in your party -> Each opponent destroys an ability or equipment he controls.
flavour: She spreads the Betrayer's madness to every corner of the Black Temple.

name: Promenade Sentinel
rules: Traitor Hero Required;When Promenade Sentinel enters play, it deals 2 arcane damage to each of up to three target heroes and/or allies.
flavour: Unauthorized entry detected. Engaging annihilation protocols.

name: Sister of Pain
rules: Traitor Hero Required;When Sister of Pain attacks, she deals 1 shadow damage to target opposing hero.
flavour: Pain is inevitable, but the suffering is optional.

name: Sister of Pleasure
rules: Traitor Hero Required;Protector;When Sister of Pleasure defends, she heals 1 damage from target hero or ally.
flavour: When it comes to the needs of Illidan's troops, Mother Shahraz knows best.

name: Temple Concubine
rules: Traitor Hero Required;If Temple Concubine would be dealt 3 or more damage, prevent it.
flavour: Business… or pleasure?

name: You Are Not Prepared!
rules: Choose one: Destroy all opposing abilities, allies, and equipment with cost 2 or less; or destroy all opposing abilities, allies, and equipment with cost 6 or more.

name: You Are Not Prepared!
rules: Draw X cards, where X is the current Boss number.

name: You Are Not Prepared!
rules: Put the top two cards of the Minion deck into play face up.

name: You Are Not Prepared!
rules: Each opponent turns one of his face-up resources face down.

name: You Are Not Prepared!
rules: Choose ability, ally, or equipment. Target player destroy all cards of that kind he controls.

name: You Are Not Prepared!
rules: Target up to two opposing allies. Roll a die. If it's even, destroy the first of them. If it's odd, destroy both of them.

name: You Are Not Prepared!
rules: Ongoing: [Exhaust] -> You pay 2 less to play your next ability this turn.

name: You Are Not Prepared!
rules: Ongoing: Each opposing weapon has -2 ATK. Each opposing armor has -2 DEF.

name: You Are Not Prepared!
rules: Each opponent destroys an ability, ally, or equipment he controls.

name: You Are Not Prepared!
rules: Target up to two opposing equipment. Roll a die. If it's even, destroy the first of them. If it's odd, destroy both of them.

name: You Are Not Prepared!
rules: Target up to two opposing abilities. Roll a die. If it's even, destroy the first of them. If it's odd, destroy both of them.

name: You Are Not Prepared!
rules: Each opponent discards his hand, then draws a card for each card discarded this way.

name: You Are Not Prepared!
rules: Put up to two ability cards with different names from your graveyard into hand.

name: You Are Not Prepared!
rules: Ongoing: [Exhaust] -> Exhaust target ally.

name: You Are Not Prepared!
rules: Remove all cards in opposing graveyard from the game.

name: You Are Not Prepared!
rules: Roll two dice. If you roll 6 or less, your hero deals that much melee damage to an opposing hero. If you roll 8 or more, your hero deals that much melee damage to an opposing ally.

name: You Are Not Prepared!
rules: Your hero deals 2 melee damage to each opposing hero and ally.

name: You Are Not Prepared!
rules: You may destroy target ability, ally, or equipment.;Ongoing: When an opponent plays an ability, ally, or equipment, interrupt it and destroy this event.

name: You Are Not Prepared!
rules: Ongoing: Opponents can't draw cards.;At the start of your turn, each opponent puts the top card of his deck into hand.

name: You Are Not Prepared!
rules: Ongoing: When any hero is destroyed, destroy target ability, ally, or equipment.

name: You Are Not Prepared!
rules: Terget an opposing ability, ally, or equipment. Remove all opposing cards in play with the same name as that card from the game.

name: You Are Not Prepared!
rules: Ongoing: Opposing cards enter play exhausted.

name: You Are Not Prepared!
rules: Ongoing: Destroy this event -> Put the top card of the Minion deck into your resource row face down and ready.

name: Demonic Fireball
rules: Choose an opponent, and he chooses one: The Batrayer deals 5 fire damage to that player's hero; or The Betrayer deals 15 fire damage to a raiding hero of that player's choice.;Ongoing: 2 -> The Betrayer deals 1 fire damage to target opposing hero.

name: Draw Soul
rules: Each opponent destroy an ally in his party.;Ongoing: Opposing heroes have -5 health.

name: Flame Crash
rules: Choose a number greater than 0, and destroy all opposing cards in play with that cost.;Ongoing: At the start of your turn, if you control five Betrayer events, The Betrayer deals 20 fire damage to each opposing hero.

name: Shadow Demons
rules: Exhaust up to four target heroes and/or allies, and each of them can't ready during its controller's next ready step.;Ongoing: 3, [Exhaust] -> You may put a Traitor ally card from your graveyard or collection into play.

name: Flames of Azzinoth
rules: The Betrayer deals 5 fire damage to each of two target opposing heroes and/or allies.;Ongoing: [Exhaust] -> Draw a card.

name: High Nethermancer Zerevor
rules: At the start if your turn, Zerevor deals 2 arcane damage to each hero and ally in a target player's party.

name: Shadowy Construct
rules: When Teron Gorefiend is destroyed, destroy Shadowy Construct. (This ally is a ghost, but it can attack only non-ghosts. See ghost rules.)

name: Veras Darkshadow
rules: Elusive, Untargetable;Veras Must attack each turn if able.

name: Lady Malande
rules: At the start of your turn, Malande heals 3 damage from target friendly ally.

name: Gathios the Shatterer
rules: Protector;If gathios would be dealt damage, prevent all but 1 of it.

name: Soul Fragment
rules: Ferocity;When Soul Fragment is destroyed, draw a card.

name: Ashtongue Channeler
rules: 1, Destroy Ashtongue Channeler -> Draw a card.
